property.name: surveyId
property.label: Survey Id
property.description: Survey Record Id to identify the Survey record and load it for the participant

property.name: logicalId
property.label: Logical Id
property.description: Unique value used to identify a survey

property.name: targetId
property.label: Target Id
property.description: Id of the record associated with survey result representing the survey subject that was evaluated using the survey
